review: I love my Fire TV.  It was easy to hook up and easy to use.  So many great programs and movies  to choose from.  I love the voice search feature. There are many free programs and movies and if you subscribe to any premium channels you can get them, like HBO Plus.I recommend it.  It's great for adults and children. ( It has parental control options )
